title.rendered: A look at the star-studded semi-finals of RFD-TV’s The American

content.rendered:
The semi-finals of the RFD-TV’s American Rodeo are less than two weeks away. The Slack begins on Feb. 25 and the semi-finals will go all the way until March 5.

The American Rodeo at AT&T Stadium is March 6-7 and like last year, all of the qualifiers will have a yellow armband.

There are several big names in rodeo who could be wearing that yellow armband and taking their shot at the $1 million prize.

Will Lowe, Spencer Wright, Cort Scheer, Jess Lockwood, Levi Simpson, Brady Minor, Luke Branquinho, Tyson Durfey, JJ Hampton and Amberleigh Moore will all have to qualify the hard way in their respective events.

RELATED:

All of ProRodeo’s Top 10 in the World Have Accepted Their Invitations to The American Rodeo Finals at AT&T Stadium
